meta.objective: Implement automated conflict resolution strategies for higher coherence.

phases.name: Intelligent Conflict Resolution
phases.description: Automate resolution of logical conflicts defined in KONFLIKTE_UND_PROZESSE.md.

tasks.issue: BPM vs TLP conflicts (e.g. high BPM with low TLP) are detected but not auto-fixed.
tasks.action: Implement `resolve_bpm_tlp_conflict(bpm, tlp)`: if `bpm > 130` and `tlp_intensity < 0.3`, return a suggested BPM scale-down (e.g., 0.8x).

tasks.issue: Genre vs RDE conflicts (e.g. Gothic with high dynamic) affect style coherence.
tasks.action: Implement `resolve_genre_rde_conflict(genre, rde)`: if `genre == 'gothic'` and `rde.dynamic > 0.8`, cap `rde.dynamic` to 0.7.

tasks.issue: Color vs Key conflicts are manual.
tasks.action: Add logic to prioritize Color-implied keys if the detected Key contradicts the dominant emotional color (reference `EMOTION_COLOR_TO_KEY` table).
